name: The Brilliant Professor Pumpkin
description:
This is a game made by Iain Harrison and Lena Van on the 29th of October 2020 for a self set game a day challenge similar to Inktober.

The game took around 30 minutes to create the art and 5 minutes to program.

All art was made by Lena Van.

The game was build in unity by Iain Harrison.
